title: Rune page Locking out? Anyone else?
body:
Once I get to champ select, I cant open my rune pages to edit them. A small brown border opens near the top of the league client, but the only thing I can do with it is click the circled "X" to close the window.

Is this a known bug? is there a fix?

replies.body: So this is, in fact, something our techs are actively looking into. Some players have been able to fix this by updating their [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) while others have had luck by restarting the client and turning on low-spec mode. Give those a try if you don't mind and let me know if it helps at all!

Im on low spec mode currently, so that didnt solve it:P 

I'll play a couple matches and update you if changing permissions helped the situation.

No worries, we're still trying to get to the root of this problem. Be sure to let me know even if that didn't help at all so we can try a couple other options. Might need to get our techs involved in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
